import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css' import { Navbar, NavbarBrand, NavItem, NavLink } from 'reactstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { getCookie, removeCookie } from 'typescript-cookie'; import React from 'react'; export function NavBar(){ function loginHandler(){ window.location.href = "https://oauth.vk.com/authorize?client_id=51483485&display=page&redirect_uri=http://localhost:3000&response_type=code&v=5.131"; } function logoutHandler(){ removeCookie("islogin"); removeCookie('image'); removeCookie('id'); window.location.href = "http://localhost:3000/"; } const VkButton = ; return ( <>
    Магазин Продукты
    Корзина
) }
